name: RTCRtpTransceiver.mid
description: The read-only RTCRtpTransceiver interface's mid property specifies the negotiated media ID (mid) which the local and remote peers have agreed upon to uniquely identify the stream's pairing of sender and receiver.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
